last_episode_to_air.name: Innocence Lost Pt. 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: With Kelby captured aboard an airship and Philly in close pursuit, Sam's Cannon Buster programming takes over -- but a friend may be an enemy.

name: Cannon Busters
original_name: キャノン・バスターズ
overview: With a maintenance robot and a deadly fugitive tagging along, friendship droid S.A.M searches for its best friend, the heir to a kingdom under siege.

episodes.name: High Risk, Low Reward!
episodes.overview: Sam and Casey arrive in Balloon Town not knowing where to go next; they hope Philly the Kid can help them despite the bounty hunters on his tail.

episodes.name: Grifters Gonna Grift
episodes.overview: When Bessie breaks down, the trio makes a deal with Mama Hitch for repairs; Sam dreams of the last time she saw Kelby on the night Botica was attacked.

episodes.name: Watch Out for the Wet Spot
episodes.overview: Mama Hitch prepares to carve up Philly's corpse as her sons try to strip Bessie for parts; the magician reveals his true identity to the King.

episodes.name: 9INE
episodes.overview: In Happy Lucky Market Town, Philly sends Casey off to buy supplies as he goes after the legendary -- and very drunk -- ronin known as 9ine.

episodes.name: 21 the Hard Way
episodes.overview: As 9ine, Sam and Casey enjoy a night out on the town, Bessie breaks down and Philly finds himself communing with nature extremely closely.

episodes.name: Unfettered
episodes.overview: Philly heads to Madura City with the droids to pay a bar tab, but when they arrive they find a ghost town -- and a very unfriendly threat.

episodes.name: Lady & the Kid
episodes.overview: Masked fighters attack Kelby and Odin; Lady Day continues to track Philly and dispatches a droid to locate a bounty hunter named Jojo.

episodes.name: Turnbuckle Ex-Machina
episodes.overview: After arriving in a dump town called Zenith, Sam puts her friendship lessons from Philly into practice; Case meets a droid with a gloomy outlook.

episodes.name: Lullaby of the Stars
episodes.overview: On the run from a giant crab, the trio falls into a deep pit and is welcomed as saviors by the strange beings living there -- but there's a catch.

episodes.name: Squeaking Springs Afternoon
episodes.overview: In Squeaking Springs, Sam works as a waitress in a bar and meets a kid named Jojo as Philly finds himself in jail for murder.

episodes.name: Innocence Lost Pt. 1
episodes.overview: The trio reaches Gara's Keep, but things are strangely quiet; Sam, undeterred, insists on going in -- convinced that she will finally see Kelby again.

episodes.name: Innocence Lost Pt. 2
episodes.overview: With Kelby captured aboard an airship and Philly in close pursuit, Sam's Cannon Buster programming takes over -- but a friend may be an enemy.
